column4: about NFS: i am able to ssh and sftp to my remote machine, but not nfs -- nfs-kernel is up and running ok -- hints & tips?
about NFS: i am able to ssh and sftp to my remote machine, but not nfs -- nfs-kernel is up and running, /etc/exports contains my local machine ok -- hints & tips?
have you defined the directories you're sharing in /etc/exports on the NFS server?
and you restarted nfs-kernel-server after doing so?
and you've defined the remote directories in /etc/fstab on the client(s)?
it says: Neither 'subtree_check' or 'no_subtree_check' specified for export
ah, have you tried adding 'no_subtree_check' to the options in /etc/exports?
KVM is more for server virtualization
yep, but built natively into the Linux kernel
it's now called Kompozer, I use it
